content.title: State Rice Mission Scheme
content.details: The “State Rice Mission Scheme” is a State Plan Scheme, which is implemented by the Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya. The objective of the scheme is to increase productivity and production of rice through improved technologies and extension methods and, to supply the quality/certified seeds/organic fertilizers at 50% subsidy.
benefits: Training, Awareness program, extension, Technology support, Subsidy on inputs.
50 % Subsidy for quality paddy seeds to farmers.
Minor irrigation (Check dam, shallow tube well, etc.)
50 % sale of Power Tillers SRI Tools for demonstration.
eligibility: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Meghalaya.
The applicant should be a bonafide farmer engaged in agriculture.
content.application_process: Offline. The eligible bonafide farmer can apply/write an application on plain paper. Along with the application, attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required). Submit the duly filled and signed application along with the relevant documents at the nearest office of the Agriculture Development Officer of a CD Block/ Agriculture Circle.
documents_required: Documents proof of having sufficient available cultivable land

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The key objective of the scheme is to increase productivity and production of rice through improved technologies and extension methods and through supply of Quality/ Certified seeds, Organic fertilizers, Bio-fertilizers & Bio-pesticides including Training, awareness program & Technology Support to the farmers.

faqs.question: Which department has launched this scheme?
faqs.answer: Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya.

faqs.question: Who can apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The bonafide farmers having cultivable land engage in agriculture can apply under the scheme.

faqs.question: What is the pattern of assistance?
faqs.answer: Training, Awareness program, extension, Technology support and Subsidy on inputs.

faqs.question: What is the type of assistance/entitlement?
faqs.answer: 50 % Subsidy for quality paddy seeds, Minor irrigation (Check dam, shallow tube well, etc), 50 % sale of Power Tillers SRI Tools for demonstration, Trainings.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The bonafide farmers can apply in plain paper through the nearest Agriculture Development Officer of a CD Block/ Agriculture Circle.

faqs.question: What is the beneficiaries’ selection procedure?
faqs.answer: The bonafide farmers having sufficient available cultivable land shall be selected on a first come first serve basis.
